long_description: Designed specifically for self massage and muscle regeneration, the GoFit Extreme Massage Bar targets muscle pain caused by exercise and everyday activities. Uses range from stretching and light tissue massage to deep tissue and maximum muscle relief. Lightweight textured surface helps restore flexibility and roll the pain away; it pinpoints deep tissue knots and trigger points. Durable closed-cell foam is firmer than muscle tissue; soft textured surface is easy on the skin and helps maintain the bar's position. The GoFit Extreme Massage Bar includes a training manual.
short_description: Designed specifically for self massage and muscle regeneration, the GoFit Extreme Massage Bar targets muscle pain caused by exercise and everyday activities.
